name: v0.44.0
body:
- report results should be modifiable (#704)
- trim whitespace between output format options (#703)

name: v0.43.0
body:
- Ignore `failOnDynamicVersions()` to fetch latest versions (#593)
- Requires Gradle 7.0 baseline (earlier plugin versions can be used otherwise)  

This release migrated the plugin from Groovy to Kotlin, and therefore there may be some slight regressions. Please let us know if you find any problems.

name: v0.42.0
body: Prevent builds from failing w/ configuration cache enabled on Gradle 7.4+ (#410)

name: v0.41.0
body: Fixed ConcurrentModificationException (#578)

name: v0.40.0
body:
New parameter to improve on the resolution of dependency constraints: checkBuildEnvironmentConstraints
It will enabled project to check external constraints, like those defined in init script
For details see PR #577 .

name: v0.39.0
body:
Some important changes:
* During the check we now try all project configurations instead of only selected ones. Those which cannot be checked are logged at `info` level so no more `Failed to resolve ...` error logs.
* The dependency ambiguity issue in the report has been resolved. There no longer is an up-to-date dependency with version `none` and the same dependency with a concrete version in the out-of-date section.
* A new result category has been added: Dependencies that were declared without version are categorized `undeclared` emphasizing that version comparison cannot be performed because no version is given.
* For details see PR #522 .

name: v0.38.0
body: Fixed dangling open file handle (#472)

name: v0.37.0
body: Show the current [dependency's reason](https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/declaring_dependencies.html#sec:documenting-dependencies) in the report (#477)

name: v0.36.0
body: - Ignore when kotlin-stdlib has a null version (#443)

name: v0.35.0
body: - Copy Kotlin variant metadata from alternative source (#442)

name: v0.34.0
body: - Copy Kotlin's MPP legacy metadata for variant selection (#438)

name: v0.33.0
body: - Restrict inherited dependencies to Kotlin's stdlib (#424)

name: v0.32.0
body:
- Copy configuration attributes for variant resolution (#334)
- Resolve with the classifier and extension if specified (#224)
- Retain inherited dependencies from super configurations (#423)

- HTML report showed the current instead of release version (#420)
- Copy attributes for Kotlin multi-platform dependency query (#334)

name: v0.30.0
body: - HTML report output (#418)

name: v0.29.0
body: - Fix NPE caused by malformed repository metadata (#409)

name: v0.28.0
body:
> Note: the Gradle Versions Plugin now requires at least **Gradle 5.0** to function.

- Improve performance (#378)
- Fix crash on Gradle 6.2 when using deprecated `resolutionStrategy` property assignment (#377)
- Fix erroneous `Failed to resolve ...` error messages

name: v0.27.0
body: Made dependency constraint resolution optional (#352, #353)

name: v0.26.0
body:
Resolve [dependency constraints](https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/managing_transitive_dependencies.html#sec:dependency_constraints
) (#350)

name: v0.25.0
v0.24.0
body: Fixed backwards compatibility of direct closure assignment (#331)

name: v0.23.0
body: Provide current version to component selection rule (#327, @ghus-raba)

name: v0.22.0
body:
- Gradle 6 compatibility (#270)
- Fix Gradle release channel for nightly setting (#299)

name: v0.21.0
body:
- Remove incompatible parallelization (#255)
- Ability to specify the Gradle Release Channel (#272)
- Avoid output of mixed file separators in report (#251)
- Console report should not appear with custom`outputFormatter` (#254)

name: v0.20.0
body: Add flag to disable gradle update check (#241)

name: v0.19.0
body: Use non-strict parsing of `pom.xml` when extracting extra metadata (#238)

name: v0.18.0
body:
* Check Gradle version (#76)
* Parallel dependency resolution (#201)
* Ability to set a custom report name (#225)
* Display dependencies in sorted order (#165)
* Resolve Gradle 4.6+ BOM style dependencies (#231)
* Show the project url for updatable dependencies (#94)

Thanks to these wonderful contributors:
@mkobit @rpau @aaronols @Poeschl @gabrielittner @johnjohndoe @jaredsburrows @vanniktech

name: v0.17.0
body: - Fixed incorrect up-to-date check (#187)

name: v0.16.0
body: - Gradle 4.2 compatibility with custom report closure (#185)

name: v0.15.0
body:
- Add support for Gradle 4.0-rc1 (#162)
- Close streams to avoid file handle leaks (#157)

name: v0.14.0
body:
- Add support for Gradle 3.4 (#137, #125, #127)
- Restored support for some older Gradle versions (#132, #134)

- Fixed duplicate listings for unresolved dependencies (#91)
- Compatibility with [dependency-management-plugin](https://github.com/spring-gradle-plugins/dependency-management-plugin) (#97)
- Use system-dependent path separator (#104)

- Correct listing when configurations use different dependency versions (#65)
- No longer aggregates repositories due to name collisions (#66)
- Clarify text report when a project has no dependencies (#52)
- Report output using the project's buildDir (#80)
- Scope resolution strategy to task (#68)

name: v0.11.2
body: Bugfix release for performance degradation in 0.11.x

name: v0.11.1
body: Bug fix to evaluate only external dependencies.

name: v0.11
body: Supports `revisionStrategy` to allow for custom exclusion rules, such as rejecting versions containing `alpha`.

name: v0.10.1
body: No-change patch release (0.10 was broken)

name: v0.10
body: Bugfix release for builds with `flatDir` repositories
Compatibility release for Gradle 2.4-rc-1
